FuncDef: The display service-security statistics ipv6 command displays statistics about matched rules in IPv6 MPAC policies.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MPAC policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces and must start with a letter.

Examples: rule 5 permit ipv6-ext-header source-routing-type srh (0 times matched)
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
MPAC policies can be configured to filter packets to be sent to the CPU, thereby helping protect devices against various types of attacks.
The display service-security statistics ipv6 command displays statistics about matched rules in IPv6 MPAC policies.
